overview: In a collage of clips, the Mattima collective spins a network of movements, filmed in solitude and under simple conditions. Together they create a collective dance performance and images of community in a time of social distancing. The film is part of the Norwegian project Tidskapsel, initiated by Filmfond Nord and Nordnorsk Filmsenter together with Troms√∏ International Film Festival.
title: Days of Flux
